biotools.summary: Automated system that provides dynamic genome annotations for custom input files that contain transcriptomic regions, which can be peak regions detected by CLIP-Seq analysis (that detect protein-RNA interactions), RNA modifications (alias the epitranscriptome), CAGE-tag locations, or any other collection of target regions at the level of the transcriptome. It is designed as a reporting tool for the functional analysis of RNA-binding sites detected by high-throughput experiments.
